title: How to Stop Dried Fruit and Nuts from Falling to the Bottom of Cakes

methods.name: Flour coating method for currants and raisins

steps.headline: Pour flour into a shallow dish.
Roll the currants and raisins in the flour until thoroughly coated.
Add to the cake mix as required.
Pour the flour into a shallow dish.
Coat the warmed nuts and fruit in flour.
Add the to cake mix as required.

text: Flour coating method for currants and raisins Pour flour into a shallow dish.  Roll the currants and raisins in the flour until thoroughly coated.  Add to the cake mix as required.  Warming method Pour the flour into a shallow dish.  Warm the nuts and fruit.  Coat the warmed nuts and fruit in flour.  Add the to cake mix as required.
sentences: Flour coating method for currants and raisins Pour flour into a shallow dish.
Roll the currants and raisins in the flour until thoroughly coated.
Add to the cake mix as required.
Warming method Pour the flour into a shallow dish.
Coat the warmed nuts and fruit in flour.
Add the to cake mix as required.
